alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:24PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, southern Henry, east central Coffee and northern Houston Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Abbeville to near New Brockton. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Headland, Dothan, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Midland City, Kinsey, Level Plains, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, New Brockton, Columbia, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Newville and Napier Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
